name: GLTsTheLeadoff
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: GLTs The Leadoff is a daily dose of Bloomington-Normal news, arts and culture, and music. Every day on GLTs daily podcast, we will deep-dive into one local story. Then we will get you ready for the day (or the weekend) with a look ahead with GLT reporters and guests from the community. Available by 7 a.m. every weekday, starting May 6.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
